body:
Comment 11: 
Thanks.  Unfortunately that didn't tell me anything.  I thought I would see some unusual
options, but I don't.

Next please try, in the misc/cgo/test directory
    go test -work -ldflags "-linkmode=internal"
Then cd to
    $WORK/_/home/iant/go/misc/cgo/test/_test/_obj_test
and run
    objdump -dr _all.o
Within the first 20 lines or so there should be a reference to _cgoexp_NNNN_goCallback. 
Attach five or so surrounding lines in each direction.  I don't know all the output,
just enough to see the instructions being relocated.

Thanks.
